attributes.action: Help to International students in tuition due to coronavirus and lockdowns.
attributes.additional_details: International students are neglected and they are not getting any help in tuition from University or government. Special loans and temporary help should be provided to students like me whose parents are struggling and my education is jeopardized due to the whole unexpected coronavirus situation. No one saw this coming and if they do not get support at right time it will be too late. Help decreasing tuition of provide loans to complete their education.
attributes.background: International students are paying huge amounts for zoom lectures when people are losing jobs and their parents are struggling for survival. I guess help or loans should be provided to International students in this unexpected situation which has caused them mental and financial stress.

rejection.details:
We think these are similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555516
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

If you'd like something different, you could start a new petition explaining what.
